pullRequest.title: MULE-18559: Support @RuntimeVersion annotation
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit makes it possible to inject a instance of MuleVersion on fields annotated with
@RuntimeVersion

nodes.bodyText: Should it be MuleVersion instead of String?
what is a custom model property? Did you mean private?
instead of calling this method 3 times, shouldn't it be refactored so that all the annotations and types are passed together and the list of fields is iterated only once?
this is basically a copy paste from RefNameDeclarationEnricher. Create a base class for both and avoid code duplication

afterCommit.message: More changes requested in PR review

nodes.bodyText: there's still a lot of duplicated code. Can't the part of fetching the ImplementType and extracting the fields also be reused by simply passing the Annotation class to filter upon?
can you explain this change? this doesn't provide the proposed optimization

commit.message: Easy changes requested in PR review
Add missing capability of inject the MuleVersion into fields of operation classes
More changes requested in PR review

beforeCommit.message: More changes requested in PR review
